pkgmetadata.longdescription: Uses Brown's method to combine p-values from dependent tests // Combining P-values from multiple statistical tests is common in bioinformatics. However, this procedure is non-trivial for dependent P-values. This package implements an empirical adaptation of Browns Method (an extension of Fishers Method) for combining dependent P-values which is appropriate for highly correlated data sets found in high-throughput biological experiments.
